headline: CSX Chief Financial Officer and Chief Operating Officer to Address UBS Global Industrials and Transportation Conference
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., Nov. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- CSX Corp. (NASDAQ: CSX) Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, Kevin Boone and Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer, Mike Cory, will address the 2025 UBS Global Industrials and Transportation Conference in Palm Beach on Tuesday, December 2, at 8:50 a.m. Eastern Time. This address will be broadcast live via webcast at http://investors.csx.com. A replay will be available following the conclusion of this event. Thi
